_instructions: Edit the 'string' values with your Boolean queries. Set enabled:false to pause a query without deleting it. See references/boolean-search-patterns.md for ready-to-use query strings by role type.

queries.name: My Role - Greenhouse + Lever (Remote US)
queries.string: (site:greenhouse.io OR site:lever.co) ("your role title" OR "senior your role title") ("remote" OR "remote-first") ("US" OR "United States")

queries.name: My Role - Workday (Remote)
queries.string: site:myworkdayjobs.com ("your role title" OR "senior your role title") ("remote" OR "remote-first")

queries.name: My Role - ICIMS (Remote)
queries.string: site:careers.icims.com ("your role title" OR "senior your role title") ("remote")
